phone.name: phone
phone.description: The phone number for the store

city.name: city
city.description: City where the store is located

state.label: State

zipcode.label: Zip Code

crmname.name: crmname

plainaddress.label: Distribution List
plainaddress.name: plainaddress

serviceaddress.name: serviceaddress

column2.label: Column 2
column2.name: column2
column2.description: Right hand column of the full-width page layout

headerimage.label: Header image
headerimage.name: headerimage
headerimage.description: The header image used on standard and location pages

googleplus.label: Google Plus
googleplus.name: googleplus
googleplus.description: The URL of the store on Google+

yelp.label: Yelp
yelp.name: yelp
yelp.description: The URL of the store on Yelp

citysearch.label: CitySearch

yahoolocal.name: yahoolocal
yahoolocal.description: The URL of the store on Yahoo Local

yellowpages.label: Yellow Pages

foursquare.name: foursquare

mapquest.label: Mapquest

mapquest.description: The URL of the store on MapQuest

title.label: Title
title.name: title

mapshortcode.label: Map Shortcode
mapshortcode.name: mapshortcode

servicehours.label: Service Hours
servicehours.name: servicehours

saleshours.label: Sales Hours
saleshours.name: saleshours

department.label: Department
department.name: department

citympg.label: City MPG
citympg.name: citympg
citympg.description: MPG the vehicle gets in the city

startdate.label: Start Date
startdate.name: startdate
startdate.description: The date when a special/promotion starts

enddate.label: End Date
enddate.name: enddate
enddate.description: The date when the special/promotion ends

specialtype.label: Special Type
specialtype.name: specialtype
specialtype.description: The type of special (sales or service)

disclaimer.label: Disclaimer
disclaimer.name: disclaimer
disclaimer.description: The disclaimer to include on the service/sales coupon

rules.label: Rules
rules.name: rules
rules.description: The rules document for the contest, should be a PDF

rating.label: Rating
rating.name: rating
rating.description: The rating for the review on a scale from 1 to 5

customer.label: Customer Name
customer.name: customer
customer.description: The name of the customer providing a review

homeslide.label: Home Slideshow ID
homeslide.name: homeslide
homeslide.description: The numeric ID of the slideshow (from the Slideshow plugin) for the desktop home page.

promoslide.label: Promotions Slideshow ID
promoslide.name: promoslide
promoslide.description: The numeric ID of the slideshow for the promotions page (provided by the Slideshow plugin)

invsearch.label: Inventory Search
invsearch.name: invsearch
invsearch.description: The image used on the mobile home page to link the user to the inventory search.

getapproved.label: Get Approved
getapproved.name: getapproved
getapproved.description: The image used on the mobile home page that links to the credit application

ourdifference.label: Our Difference
ourdifference.name: ourdifference
ourdifference.description: The image used on the mobile home page that links to the company difference page

compstmt.label: Company Statement
compstmt.name: compstmt
compstmt.description: The company's statement or motto, used on the home page and page headers

compsignature.label: Company Signature
compsignature.name: compsignature
compsignature.description: The name signed at the end of the company statement, used on the home page and page headers

compdiffseal.label: Company Difference Seal
compdiffseal.name: compdiffseal
compdiffseal.description: A company seal, used in headers and on the home page

twitterurl.label: Twitter URL
twitterurl.name: twitterurl

googleurl.name: googleurl

youtubeurl.name: youtubeurl

googlemarketing.label: Google Marketing Code
googlemarketing.name: googlemarketing
googlemarketing.description: The marketing code to include on each page for tracking Google ads

termsconds.label: Terms and Conditions
termsconds.name: termsconds

compname.label: Company Name
compname.name: compname
compname.description: The company's name, used randomly throughout the site

contactatonce.label: Contact At Once Code
contactatonce.name: contactatonce
contactatonce.description: Code used to display a chat option for Contact at Once

compphone.label: Company Phone
compphone.name: compphone

compphonename.name: compphonename
compphonename.description: An alternate name for the company's phone number, such as 877-USED-CARS

paymenturl.name: paymenturl
paymenturl.description: The URL of the company on PortalPay (or any payment site really)

logoalttext.label: Logo Alt Text
logoalttext.name: logoalttext
logoalttext.description: The alternate text used on the company logo

blogimageheader.label: Blog Post Image Header
blogimageheader.name: blogimageheader
blogimageheader.description: Header image used on blog entries, and category pages

vehimageheader.name: vehimageheader
vehimageheader.description: The image used at the top of the vehicle pages

formemailfrom.label: Form Email From Address
formemailfrom.name: formemailfrom
formemailfrom.description: The email address used as the "From" line in emails sent from forms, both to the CRM and distribution lists

compurl.label: Company URL
compurl.name: compurl
compurl.description: The company's URL, used in the vendor section of the ADF

compemail.label: Company Email Address
compemail.name: compemail
compemail.description: The company's generic email inbox, used in the ADF layout under the vendor section

compmailaddr.label: Company Mailing Address
compmailaddr.name: compmailaddr
compmailaddr.description: The company's mailing address, used in the vendor section of the ADF

compmailcity.label: Company Mailing City

compmailstate.label: Company Mailing State

compmailzip.label: Company Mailing Zip
compmailzip.name: compmailzip

trustpiloturl.label: TrustPilot URL

bbburl.name: bbburl

vehwarranty.label: Vehicle Warranty Highlights
vehwarranty.name: vehwarranty
vehwarranty.description: The information used in the warranty tab on the vehicle page

reviewemail.label: Review Notification Email
reviewemail.name: reviewemail

cookieid.label: Cookie ID
cookieid.name: cookieid
cookieid.description: The ID to use for the cookie on the website. Used to handle session information.

spamemail.name: spamemail
spamemail.description: The email address where suspected spam submissions are sent to.

picture.label: Picture
picture.name: picture

googleconversion.name: googleconversion
